Adrenaline Rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
Adrenaline Rush.blurb: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.
Adrenaline Rush.description: Innate: Dr. Mundo passively regenerates   1.5% of his maximum health every 5 seconds     0.3% of his maximum health each second  .
Adrenaline Rush.notes: * Adrenaline Rush is not affected by  Revitalize as it is considered as health regeneration.

Infected Cleaver.name: Infected Cleaver
Infected Cleaver.blurb: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
Infected Cleaver.description: Active: Dr. Mundo hurls a cleaver in the target direction, dealing  magic damage to the first enemy it hits and  slowing it by 40% for 2 seconds.
Infected Cleaver.leveling:
Magic Damage:
20 / 22.5 / 25 / 27.5 / 30% of target's current health
Infected Cleaver.description2: Infected Cleaver has a minimum damage threshold, and is capped against  minions and  monsters.
Infected Cleaver.description3: If Infected Cleaver hits an enemy, 40% of the  health cost is refunded, and if it kills it, 80% of the health cost is refunded.
Infected Cleaver.leveling3:
Health Refund On Hit:
20 / 24 / 28 / 32 / 36
Health Refund On Kill:
40 / 48 / 56 / 64 / 72
Infected Cleaver.notes:
* As with all abilities with health costs Infected Cleaver will not reduce Dr. Mundo's health below 1, effectively making it free-to-cast at that threshold.
 Health cost refund on the ability is affected by increased healing from  Spirit Visage,  Revitalize and  Heal power.
 Dr. Mundo will still heal if Infected Cleaver is blocked.

Burning Agony.name: Burning Agony
Burning Agony.blurb: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
Burning Agony.description: Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and gaining  30% Tenacity.
Burning Agony.notes:
* As with all abilities with health costs, Burning Agony will not reduce Dr. Mundo's health below 1.
 However this only happens once per ability cast. The ability will be put on a 1 second cooldown the next time his health is lower than the cost.

Masochism.name: Masochism
Masochism.blurb: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
Masochism.description: Passive: Taking magic damage or paying a  health cost increases Dr. Mundo's  magic resistance by 3% for 2 seconds, stacking up to an amount.
Masochism.description2: Active: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage for 5 seconds, increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health).
Masochism.leveling2:
Minimum Bonus AD:
40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100
Maximum Bonus AD:
80 / 110 / 140 / 170 / 200
Masochism.description3: Additionally, Dr. Mundo's next basic attack within the duration will cost health, but gains  25 bonus range and deals  bonus physical damage.
Masochism.leveling3:
Health Cost:
25 / 35 / 45 / 55 / 65
Bonus Physical Damage:
3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% of his maximum health
Masochism.description4: Masochism resets Dr. Mundo's basic attack timer.
Masochism.notes:
* As with all abilities with health costs Masochism will not reduce Dr. Mundo's health below 1, effectively making it free-to-cast at that threshold.
 Health cost is paid upon basic attacking once after activating Masochism, not upon activating Masochism.
 The health cost will be paid whether or not the basic attack deals damage (e.g.  blind).

 The attack damage bonus adjusts dynamically to Dr. Mundo's health.
 Masochism's bonus AD is the highest basic-ability-steroid in the game.
 Masochism's bonus physical damage does not affect structures. However, the bonus AD gained on activation will increase Dr. Mundo's damage against structures like any other AD source would.

Sadism.name: Sadism
Sadism.blurb: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
Sadism.description: Active: Dr. Mundo regenerates  health over 12 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed for the duration.
Sadism.leveling:
Total Regeneration:
50 / 62.5 / 75 / 87.5 / 100% maximum health
Regeneration Per Second:
4.17 / 5.21 / 6.25 / 7.29 / 8.33% maximum health
Bonus Movement Speed:
15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35%
Sadism.notes:
* Sadism adjusts dynamically to Dr. Mundos maximum health.
 Sadism will continue its healing effect through pseudo-death effects and while in stasis ( Chronoshift,  Fate's Call,  Zhonya's Hourglass,  Guardian Angel).
 Sadism is not affected by  Revitalize as it is considered as health regeneration.
